name: all-the-german-words
description: An array of ~168,000 German words. Offers both correct spelling and all lowercase. Works in node and browsers.
author: CreativeCouple, zeke

scripts.create-corpus: node crawl-wiktionary.js > corpus/wiktionary.txt && node fetch-atebits.js > corpus/de.txt
scripts.build: node build.js > woerter.json && node build.js -l > lowercase.json && node build.js -u > uppercase.json
